newsitem.title: TURKEY: Bosphorus closed to traffic due to fog.
newsitem.headline: Bosphorus closed to traffic due to fog.

text.p: The narrow Bosphorus strait was closed to northbound traffic since early morning due to fog over Istanbul, maritime officials said on Wednesday.
"The Bosphorus has been closed since 3.30 a.m. (0130 GMT). Visibility is very low, about half a mile," said one official.
